description:
The younger sister (imouto) of the two maids working for the demon queen and the hero.
Together with her older sister she`s been found to be a runaway serf in one of the stables of the country mansion, and instead of being reported given food, new clothes, and jobs as maids in the mansion.
Having started out as a scared little girl, Little Sister Maid turns into a cheerful and lovely child that is able to embrace happiness, especially when she is being praised to have cooked yet another wonderful dish. She is becoming quite the expert with food and drinks.
name: Maid-imouto
